entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:50 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:50 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 6:50 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
